amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete $17.4 million appropriated for renovation of two Army barracks in Mannheim, Germany.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to cut $17.4 million from the Army's military construction account. The funds are directed at unrequested renovations of two Army barracks in Mannheim, Germany.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Furse amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 121 - 289 (Roll no. 200).
